name: GKBox
desc: The definition of an axis-aligned rectangular bounding volume addressed by the tree.

items.desc: The corner of the box with the highest coordinate values (in most coordinate systems, the near-upper-right corner).

items.name: var boxMin: vector_float3
items.desc: The corner of the box with the lowest coordinate values (in most coordinate systems, the far-lower-left corner).
